about_the_game:
Galaxy Hassle is a story-rich fixed shooter that lets you play as Corelatine Rangers Ralph and Brad, and they need your help to apprehend Dr. Jillkoy, an evil scientist whose goal is to evolve all species to their "ultimate potential," whatever that means.

Face against the many monstrous creations in Jillkoy's army. They will do whatever it takes to keep you away from their master. What they don't take into account are the many weapons in your arsenal...

The guns of the game!

Stock - This is your default weapon. It's good for picking off small amounts of enemies, and you don't run out of ammo! However, you may want to use something with more firepower when those creatures inevitably flood your screen.

Shotgun - This gun shoots 5 bullets in a spread. While slower, it does a good job clearing out asteroids and other enemies close to you when you badly need some personal space.

Spread Shotgun - Much like the Shotgun, except now it shoots 9 bullets with an even wider spread!

Seekers - This gun will shoot bullets that seek the closest enemy (including asteroids!). It's excellent for effortless, long-range firing.

Note: All of the guns except for Stock require ammo. You can switch to any of these weapons at any time so long as you have the ammo for them!

Co-op

Have a friend/brother/sister/dad/mom/dog/parrot/grimtern/jug of milk that wants to play? Great! Player two can use the arrow keys on the keyboard and play with you in any game mode! Have a controller or two? You can use those too!

Controls

Controls are really simple for this game! You can do it one-handed!

On keyboard it's as follows:

Player 1 - WASD and Space to shoot, fire, and change weapons.

Player 2 - Arrow keys and left Ctrl to shoot, fire, and change weapons.

Secrets

There are also 7 secrets to be found in the game, and maybe more for you to discover in future updates! Can you find them all?

name: Galaxy Hassle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.00Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 210
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.00Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Step into the shoes of Corelatine Rangers Ralph and Brad, as they steer their way through Asteroid Fields and Monsters a-plenty, to arrest Dr. Jillkoy - A menace known for his deadly atrocities towards intergalactic citizens. Do you have what it takes to see him behind bars?
